HDG.IM.content: spirit is what sustains/rules, first & last [first last], not merely indispensable 3rd element > cultural values secure meaning, restricted to their standards of self-validity: poetry for poetry’s sake, art for art’s sake, science for science’s sake > [no longer question thus no longer spiritual?] > re: science and situation of university, a situation unchanged despite some cleansing [Nazi?]

HDG.BC.content: dealing (das Betreiben) w/ beings > being of beings never experienced by those who produce/shape/represent beings > superfluity of Being a surplus? or useless, poverty of emptiness?

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.BC.linkedContent: dealing (das Betreiben) w/ beings > being of beings never experienced by those who produce/shape/represent beings > superfluity of Being a surplus? or useless, poverty of emptiness?

HDG.BC.content: guidewords (Leitworte) > being is emptiest at same time surplus (Überfluss) > “is” indicates emptiness (Leere) (reflection [Nachdenken] can find no support [Anhalt]) & wealth (Reichtum) w/in which Being of beings pronounces (ausspricht) itself > w/ “is,” a surplus put into words [is this different w/ any other word? transcendental signifier]

HDG.BC.content: modernity grasps all experiencing, planning, constructing of actual unconditionally & correctly as the new [will to power?]: superiority of beings over Being has been decided > Being empty or a surplus?

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, Nietzsche’s interpretation of nihilism a process where “the highest values become devalued”

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, Nietzsche’s interpretation of nihilism a process where “the highest values become devalued”

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.FS.content: Husserlian idea of “surplus (Überschusses)”: the “is” through which I observe object/substance is a “surplus” re: sensuous affections > categorial just as given as sensuous, thus CATEGORIAL INTUITION > Husserl teaches CI by way of analogy (a measure for correspondence): categorial corresponds to sense data (which is the measure of the analogy)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.FS.linkedContent: Husserlian idea of “surplus (Überschusses)”: the “is” through which I observe object/substance is a “surplus” re: sensuous affections > categorial just as given as sensuous, thus CATEGORIAL INTUITION > Husserl teaches CI by way of analogy (a measure for correspondence): categorial corresponds to sense data (which is the measure of the analogy)

HDG.OHF.content: system as a context of classification (sketch out framework then allocate respective places for concrete beings) > the relational becomes the object proper, pushes to the fore: dominating/pervading everything, it constitutes being in authentic sense > the classificatory is immutable (Unwandelbare), elevated above what it organizes/rules, the trans-temporal in-itself (das überzeitliche Ansich) (being, validity [Gelten], value, subsistence [Bestehen]—contrasts sensible reality)

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.OHF.content: [preliminary descriptions of ready-to-hand & present-at-hand] total domain of what’s real: 1) things in nature 2) things of value > authentic being of table: material thing in space [?] [given “in the flesh (leibhafte)”]
